snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia, faced with a West angry over his actions in Ukraine, has been strengthening ties to the East and will be in Beijing this coming week, as will President Obama.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Pres Obama is visiting Beijing to help refocus American foreign policy toward Asia at same time as Russia Pres Vladimir Putin; some experts dismiss prospect of more meaningful alliance between Russia and China, but others say that Obama administration should take threat seriously as Moscow pursues energy, financing and military deals with Beijing.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia, faced with a West angry over his actions in Ukraine, has been strengthening ties to the East and will be in Beijing this coming week, as will President Obama.

headline.main: As Russia Draws Closer to China, U.S. Faces a New Challenge
headline.print_headline: A Pivot to Asia? Putin Shows Two Can Play That Game
